metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24773 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Forge (also called `node-forge`) is a native implementation of Transport Layer Security in JavaScript. Prior to version 1.3.0, RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 signature verification code does not properly check `DigestInfo` for a proper ASN.1 structure. This can lead to successful verification with signatures that contain invalid structures but a valid digest. The issue has been addressed in `node-forge` version 1.3.0. There are currently no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: node-node-forge package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
